resources.string: Data on your driving style is being collected

Error of gps location service response. \n Try again.
For an accurate calculation of you driving style, \n the GPS signal level should be more than 90%.
For an accurate calculation of you driving style, \n make at least a five-minute trip.

Data on your driving style is being collected

Take a trip five to thirty minutes in duration 
 
 At the end of the trip, press Stop, and we will evaluate your driving style

Congratulations! \n You are an excellent driver!
